name: Single-Shelled Organism
description:
Single-Shelled Organism Summary: Dr. Shelley is developing a de-evolution serum, but she's running out of time to work! She sends her favorite lab rat, Jekyll, through a series of tests and experiments to see what happens.

Play as Jekyll, navigate through mazes, and discover the origins of all life on Earth! Controls:
  • Any button to start
  • ESC to close game
  • WASD to move behavior shifts from stage to stage)
  • All pressure plates must be activated to finish a maze
Secret Controls:
  • During cutscene: Spacebar to skip
  • During any maze:
    • ‘I’ to skip to maze 1
    • ‘O’ to skip to maze 2
    • ‘P’ to skip to maze 3
    • ‘M’ to restart the current maze
  • During maze 3:
    • 'N' to increase difficulty (toggles between normal and inverted controls at random intervals)
Team 15: Krusty Krew

Emmalie Hall (Art/Animation)

Nicole Hatch (Programming)

Luis Mendiola (Sound/Level Design)

Made for the TAGD Fall '22 Game Jam:

"It's Evolving, Only Backwards"
